mapper.select: SELECT emp_nm, to_char(hire_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS hire_dt, work_dt, work_tm, pay_vac_tm, ot_work_tm, pl_ot_tm, ac_ot_tm, vc_count, vc_total, late_count, ab_count FROM report_tb ORDER BY seq

select count(distinct emp_seq) from (select e.emp_seq, e.emp_nm , e.join_dt , to_number(null) as 실제근로일수 , to_number(null) as 실제근로시간 , sum(v.use_holiday)*8 as 유급휴가시간 , to_number(null) as 실제초과근로시간 , to_number(null) as 야간계획근로시간 , to_number(null) as 실제야간근로시간 , sum(decode(v.holiday_year, a.year, v.use_holiday)) as 사용휴가 , sum(a.ann_days) / count(a.ann_days) as 남은휴가 , to_number(null) as 지각횟수 , to_number(null) as 결근횟수 from web_vacation v join web_empl_mgm e on v.emp_seq = e.emp_seq join web_annu_mgm a on v.emp_seq = a.emp_seq where a.year = ${startDate.substring(0,4)} group by e.emp_seq ,e.emp_nm, e.join_dt union select emp_seq, emp_nm, join_dt , to_number(null) as 실제근로일수 , to_number(null) as 실제근로시간 , to_number(null) as 유급휴가시간 , to_number(null) as 실제초과근로시간 , sum(((to_date(ot_time_end, 'HH24:MI') - to_date(ot_time_start, 'HH24:MI'))*24)) as 계획야간근로시간 , sum(decode(status, '승인', (((to_date(ot_time_end, 'HH24:MI') - to_date(ot_time_start, 'HH24:MI'))*24)))) as 실제야간근로시간 , to_number(null) as 사용휴가 , to_number(null) as 남은휴가 , to_number(null) as 지각횟수 , to_number(null) as 결근횟수 from web_empl_mgm e join web_overtime o on o.emp_num = e.emp_seq where o.reg_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} group by emp_seq, emp_nm, join_dt union select e.emp_seq, e.emp_nm, e.join_dt , count(decode(d.work_st, '정상근무', 1)) as 실제근로일수 , sum(d.WORK_TI) as 실제근로시간 , to_number(null) as 유급휴가시간 , case when sum(d.WORK_TI) > 20 then sum(d.WORK_TI )-20 else 0 end 실제초과근로시간 , to_number(null) as 계획야간근로시간 , to_number(null) as 실제야간근로시간 , to_number(null) as 사용휴가 , to_number(null) as 남은휴가 , count(decode(work_st, '지각', 1)) as 지각횟수 , count(decode(work_st, '결근', 1)) as 결근횟수 from web_empl_mgm e join web_daily d on e.emp_seq = d.emp_seq where d.reg_dt BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} group by e.emp_seq, e.emp_nm, e.join_dt) where join_dt BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} and emp_nm like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

select seq, emp_nm, hire_dt, work_dt, work_tm, pay_vac_tm, ot_work_tm, pl_ot_tm, ac_ot_tm, vc_count, vc_total, late_count, ab_count from ( select emp_seq as seq , emp_nm , to_char(join_dt, 'yyyy.MM.dd') as hire_dt , nvl(sum(실제근로일수),0) as work_dt , case when sum(실제근로시간) - trunc(sum(실제근로시간)) > 0 then trunc(sum(실제근로시간)) || '시간' || to_char( (sum(실제근로시간) - trunc(sum(실제근로시간))) * 60) || '분' when sum(실제근로시간) - trunc(sum(실제근로시간)) = 0 then sum(실제근로시간) || '시간' else '0시간' end work_tm , case when sum(유급휴가시간) - trunc(sum(유급휴가시간)) > 0 then trunc(sum(유급휴가시간)) || '시간' || to_char( (sum(유급휴가시간) - trunc(sum(유급휴가시간))) * 60) || '분' when sum(유급휴가시간) - trunc(sum(유급휴가시간)) = 0 then sum(유급휴가시간) || '시간' else '0시간' end pay_vac_tm , case when sum(실제초과근로시간) - trunc(sum(실제초과근로시간)) > 0 then trunc(sum(실제초과근로시간)) || '시간' || to_char( (sum(실제초과근로시간) - trunc(sum(실제초과근로시간))) * 60) || '분' when sum(실제초과근로시간) - trunc(sum(실제초과근로시간)) <= 0 then sum(실제초과근로시간) || '시간' else '0시간' end ot_work_tm , case when sum(야간계획근로시간) - trunc(sum(야간계획근로시간)) > 0 then trunc(sum(야간계획근로시간)) || '시간' || to_char( (sum(야간계획근로시간) - trunc(sum(야간계획근로시간))) * 60) || '분' when sum(야간계획근로시간) - trunc(sum(야간계획근로시간)) = 0 then sum(야간계획근로시간) || '시간' else '0시간' end pl_ot_tm , case when sum(실제야간근로시간) - trunc(sum(실제야간근로시간)) > 0 then trunc(sum(실제야간근로시간)) || '시간' || to_char( (sum(실제야간근로시간) - trunc(sum(실제야간근로시간))) * 60) || '분' when sum(실제야간근로시간) - trunc(sum(실제야간근로시간)) = 0 then sum(실제야간근로시간) || '시간' else '0시간' end ac_ot_tm , nvl(sum(사용휴가),0) as vc_count, nvl(sum(남은휴가),0) as vc_total , nvl(sum(지각횟수),0) as late_count , nvl(sum(결근횟수), 0) as ab_count , row_number() over (order by ${orderKeyword} ${order}) as rNum from (select emp_seq, emp_nm, join_dt , to_number(null) as 실제근로일수 , to_number(null) as 실제근로시간 , sum(use_holiday) * 8 as 유급휴가시간 , to_number(null) as 실제초과근로시간 , to_number(null) as 야간계획근로시간 , to_number(null) as 실제야간근로시간 , sum(use_holiday) as 사용휴가 , sum(ann_days) as 남은휴가 , to_number(null) as 지각횟수 , to_number(null) as 결근횟수 from ( select distinct e.emp_seq ,e.emp_nm ,e.join_dt ,a.ann_days ,a.year , sum(decode(a.year, v.holiday_year, decode(v.STATE_YSN, 'Y', v.use_holiday))) as use_holiday from web_annu_mgm a, web_vacation v, web_empl_mgm e where v.emp_seq = a.emp_seq and v.emp_seq = e.emp_seq and a.year BETWEEN ${startDate.substring(0,4)} AND ${endDate.substring(0,4)} group by e.emp_seq, a.ann_days, a.year, e.emp_nm, e.join_dt ) group by emp_seq, emp_nm, join_dt union select emp_seq, emp_nm, join_dt , to_number(null) as 실제근로일수 , to_number(null) as 실제근로시간 , to_number(null) as 유급휴가시간 , to_number(null) as 실제초과근로시간 , sum(((to_date(ot_time_end, 'HH24:MI') - to_date(ot_time_start, 'HH24:MI'))*24)) as 계획야간근로시간 , sum(decode(status, '승인', (((to_date(ot_time_end, 'HH24:MI') - to_date(ot_time_start, 'HH24:MI'))*24)))) as 실제야간근로시간 , to_number(null) as 사용휴가 , to_number(null) as 남은휴가 , to_number(null) as 지각횟수 , to_number(null) as 결근횟수 from web_empl_mgm e join web_overtime o on o.emp_num = e.emp_seq where o.reg_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} group by emp_seq, emp_nm, join_dt union select e.emp_seq, e.emp_nm, e.join_dt , sum( case when d.work_st = '정상근무' then 1 when d.work_st = '지각' then 1 when d.work_st = '오전반차' then 1 when d.work_st = '오후반차' then 1 when d.work_st = '야근' then 1 else 0 end) as 실제근로일수 , sum(d.WORK_TI) as 실제근로시간 , to_number(null) as 유급휴가시간 , case when avg(d.WORK_TI) > 8 then avg(d.WORK_TI )-8 else 0 end 실제초과근로시간 , to_number(null) as 계획야간근로시간 , to_number(null) as 실제야간근로시간 , to_number(null) as 사용휴가 , to_number(null) as 남은휴가 , count(decode(work_st, '지각', 1)) as 지각횟수 , count(decode(work_st, '결근', 1)) as 결근횟수 from web_empl_mgm e join web_daily d on e.emp_seq = d.emp_seq where d.reg_dt BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} group by e.emp_seq, e.emp_nm, e.join_dt) where join_dt BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND emp_nm like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' group by emp_seq, emp_nm, join_dt order by ${orderKeyword} ${order} ) where rNum BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd}
